alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 19 at 8:46AM MST until November 19 at 10:30AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM MST THIS MORNING FOR WEST CENTRAL KANE AND EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 846 AM MST, Zion National Park Rangers reported all drainages within the main canyon have water flowing. Doppler radar indicated 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain fall earlier. Additional showers and thunderstorms moving into the area will bring periods of moderate to heavy rainfall through 10 AM. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks, streams, slot canyons, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Zion National Park, Virgin, Springdale and Rockville. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
